title: Ein Tag im Park
translation: It is Saturday and the weather is nice. Mia wakes up early and has breakfast with her family. After breakfast, Mia asks her father if they can go to the park. Everyone puts on jackets and takes a ball and a blanket. In the park, Mia and her brother play soccer. The parents sit on the blanket, read and drink coffee. Mia sees a dog and laughs. Many children run and play. A boy asks Mia if she wants to play tag with him. Mia runs fast and everyone has a lot of fun. In the afternoon, they have a picnic and eat bread and fruit. Later, Mia gets tired and wants to go home. The family packs everything and goes home together happily.
